info.title: AuthAdmin REST API Documentation and Client
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for the BridgeIt AuthAmdin portion of the Voyent  Service.  It's also a dynamic client that you can use to exercise the API and try it out.

parameters.name: accountname
parameters.description: The id of the account record to fetch. Admin must have bridgeit.auth.viewAccount permission

200.description: Returns a single, specific record uniquely identified by the resourceId

AccessToken.description: A record containing and access_token the it's expiry time

access_token.description: A unique token used for security when accessing BridgeIt services.

expires_in.description: The time when the access_token expires.  Expressed in Unix time (the number of milliseconds since midnight on January 1, 1970.

AccountRecord.description: A record containing the account information

accountname.description: A unique name for the account. Must be unique within the system

safeAccountname.description: The value of the accountname when it has been converted to mongo-safe format

description.description: A description of the account record

custom.description: A JSON formatted string of any particular content, defined by the client

admins.description: The array of admins records defined for this account

tsa_enable.description: A flag indicating the state of Two Stage Authorization

realms.description: An array of Realm records maintained under this account

disabled.description: A flag allowing immediate halting of all logins in the realm

origins.description: An array of domain names that may use this realms services

services.description: a list of services used by users of this realm

permissions.description: Deprecated: permissions granted to all users of the realm

facebook.description: Information supporting Oauth2 integration with Facebook

tsa_enable.description: A flag forcing all users in the realm to enable two stage authorization

quick_user.description: A flag enabling quick user registration within the realm

admin_access.description: Obsolete flag allowing admins to use services. No longer required

custom.description: A JSON formatted string containing ad-hoc application values

roles.description: An array of Role descriptors associated with the realm

enableOauth.description: Flag indicating Facebook OAuth login is enabled

clientId.description: Facebook client ID from the Clients registered client application

permissions.description: Array of resource creation permissions granted to all realm users
